syrto.title: Syrto
syrto.description: Syrto® Company Intelligence is an AI-driven platform designed to identify business opportunities, manage risks, and forecast the performance of clients and suppliers. The software combines Neural Networks and Machine Learning with financial expertise, offering a comprehensive solution for decision-making. By simplifying access to financial insights, Syrto® enables users to make informed business decisions.

travelMap.title: Travel Map
travelMap.description: Travel Map is my personal web app designed to help me track and relive my travel experiences. I can visualize all the places I've visited with interactive markers on a dynamic map. For each destination, I can browse through a collection of photos, capturing the highlights of my journey, all within the app.

header.description: Full Stack Developer and Machine Learning consultant
